snippet: Host Sri Lanka beat Pakistan by 16 runs in the first semifinal of the World Twenty20. The team will meet Australia or West Indies in the final.
abstract: Sri Lanka's national cricket team beats Pakistan by 16 runs to advance to the World Twenty20 final.
lead_paragraph: Host Sri Lanka beat Pakistan by 16 runs in the first semifinal of the World Twenty20. The team will meet Australia or West Indies in the final.

headline.main: Sri Lanka Reaches World Twenty20 Final
